document_data.name: Xynicynct
document_data.mainbody: '''Xynicynct''' was the jailer of [[Vorgansharax]] in [[1489 DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Escape from Phlan|16-17}}
document_data.History: After Vorgansharax's coup, Xynicynct led a squad of the [[Tears of Virulence]] in trying to stop the escape of Madame [[Freona]], the [[Lord Sage of Phlan]], and [[Jhessail Greycastle]] from the city, but was killed by an adventuring party hired by the resistance.
